component.name: MetricPanel
component.description: Tabbed card displaying a row of stat summaries that expand to reveal detailed content (charts, tables) when clicked.

useCases: Dashboard summary section with expandable detail views per metric
KPI overview where each metric can reveal a chart or breakdown
Analytics panels that toggle between collapsed stats and expanded content

commonPatterns.name: dashboard-metrics
commonPatterns.description: A titled panel with multiple expandable metrics, each showing a chart when selected.
commonPatterns.composition: <MetricPanel title="Performance" subtitle="Last 30 days" items={[{ key: "revenue", label: "Revenue", value: "$12,400", icon: <DollarSign />, description: "Monthly total", content: <RevenueChart /> }, { key: "users", label: "Active Users", value: "3,241", icon: <Users />, content: <UsersChart /> }]} />

commonPatterns.name: pre-opened-metric
commonPatterns.description: Panel that opens with a specific metric expanded by default.

antiPatterns.reason: A MetricPanel with one item provides no comparative context; the toggle behavior is unnecessary.
antiPatterns.alternative: Use a standalone StatCard with its own content section below.

antiPatterns.reason: If all detail views must be visible simultaneously, the tab-based toggle model hides information.
antiPatterns.alternative: Use a StatsGrid with separate detail sections laid out vertically.

slots.title: Optional heading text for the panel
slots.subtitle: Optional descriptive text below the title
slots.items[].icon: Icon rendered in the stat trigger area
slots.items[].secondary: Secondary ReactNode below the metric value
slots.items[].content: Expanded content (chart, table, etc.) shown when the metric is selected

parentConstraints: Typically placed as a top-level dashboard section; avoid nesting inside other Card components

interactions.click-to-expand: Clicking a stat trigger expands its content panel below the row
interactions.click-to-collapse: Clicking the already-active stat trigger collapses the panel back to the summary row
interactions.toggle-between: Clicking a different stat trigger swaps the expanded content without an intermediate collapsed state

responsive.mobile: Stat triggers stack vertically with horizontal dividers; content panel remains full-width
responsive.desktop: Stat triggers display in a single horizontal row with vertical dividers

accessibility.role: tablist with tabpanel pattern (via Radix Tabs)
accessibility.keyboardSupport: Arrow keys navigate between metric triggers; Enter/Space activates; Tab moves focus into expanded content
accessibility.screenReader: Each metric trigger acts as a tab; expanded content is announced as the associated tabpanel
accessibility.focusManagement: Focus follows the active tab trigger; hidden closed-tab trigger is aria-hidden and removed from tab order

rules: Provide at least 2 items for meaningful comparison
Keep metric labels short so the horizontal row does not overflow
The content slot should be self-contained since only one is visible at a time
alternatives: StatCard for a single metric with no toggle behavior
Tabs for generic tabbed content without built-in stat formatting

aiHints.context: Use MetricPanel when a dashboard needs a compact stats overview row where each metric can expand to show detailed content. It combines StatCard visuals with Tabs toggle behavior inside a single Card.
